hero.title: Welcome
hero.text: to my subtitling and translation service. Are you looking for a hassle-free process of adding subtitles to your video content? Look no further!

book.title: Booking is

simple.name: Simple
simple.text: All you need to do is to send me a download link to your video, and I will take care of the rest! I will transcribe the audio, translate it if requested, and create a subtitle file supported by all major video platforms.

quick.name: Quick
quick.text: Subtitles will be delivered within 24 hours or at most 3 days from your request.

accurate.name: Accurate
accurate.text: Your subtitles will adhere to international

book.description: An invoice will be sent to you after the delivery of the subtitles. If you find any errors or misunderstandings, please reach out and I will correct them free of charge.
